step.text: $$$/Tutorial/Tap Adjustments > Saturation. Set the value to 100% to intensify the colors. Tap Apply.=Tap Adjustments > Saturation. Set the value to 100% to intensify the colors. Tap Apply.
$$$/Tutorial/Tap Add Layer > Duplicate Layer. You’ll create the painting on this layer.=Tap Add Layer > Duplicate Layer. You’ll create the painting on this layer.
$$$/Tutorial/Tap Effects > Artistic > Acrylic Paint.=Tap Effects > Artistic > Acrylic Paint.

$$$/Tutorial/Enter these values: Jitter:100%, Size:20%, Length:0%. Tap Apply. This creates a pointillist effect.=Enter these values: Jitter=100%, Size=20%, Length=0%. Tap Apply. This creates a pointillist effect.
step.tiptext: $$$/Tutorial/To enter the percentage by number instead of using the slider, tap the value field to open the keypad editor.=To enter the percentage by number instead of using the slider, tap the value field to open the keypad editor.

step.text: $$$/Tutorial/Tap the target on this layer to hide it. Tap the bottom layer.=Tap the target on this layer to hide it. Tap the bottom layer.
$$$/Tutorial/Tap Effects > Artistic > Acrylic Paint.=Tap Effects > Artistic > Acrylic Paint.

$$$/Tutorial/For an abstract brush effect, enter these values: Jitter:1%, Size:20%, Length:90%. Tap Apply.=For an abstract brush effect, enter these values: Jitter=1%, Size=20%, Length=90%. Tap Apply.
$$$/Tutorial/Tap the target on the top layer to unhide it and decide which effect you like best.=Tap the target on the top layer to unhide it and decide which effect you like best.
step.tiptext: $$$/Tutorial/To delete an unwanted layer, choose the layer in the layers panel. Tap Layer options > Delete Layer to remove the layer.=To delete an unwanted layer, choose the layer in the layers panel. Tap Layer options > Delete Layer to remove the layer.
